Text: Retention of Documents Cc PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL ATTORNEYCLIENT COMMUNICATION As we said in our initial meetings with you it is very important that you preserve your records relating to Enron Attached is a letter we received from one of the plaintiffs lawyers requesting that we preserve all documents relating to Enron We have already responded to the letter but we are passing it on to you because despite its tone it provides a useful outline of the types of records you should preserve and the places where such documents might be found Please do not hesitate to call me if you have any questions Paul Flack steve berman letterpdf This email and any attached files may be confidential and subject to attorneyclient privilege If you received it in error please immediately notify the sender by return email or by calling

RE Meeting with Wilmer Cutlerpst I am still planning to come over tomorrow at I can debrief you on the hearing then or if you want to hear it now give me a call Paul D Flack Clements ONeill Pierce Nickens Wilson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas fax Original Message From Buy Rick mailtoRick NRONcom Sent Sunday December PM To Flack Paul Subject RE Meeting with Wilmer Cutler My office is fine We will still meet prior to that as scheduled I presume I also would like a debriefing on Fridays hearing Thanks Rick Buy Original Message From Flack Paul Sent Sun PM To Buy Rick Cc Subject Meeting with Wilmer Cutler We will be meeting with Wilmer Cutler at am on I told them we could do it in your office but if you would like to do it somewhere else just let me know Paul D Flack Clements ONeill Pierce Nickens Wilson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas fax This email and any attached files may be confidential and subject to attorneyclient privilege If you received it in error please immediately notify the sender by return email or by calling This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you This email and any attached files may be confidential and subject to attorneyclient privilege If you received it in error please immediately notify the sender by return email or by calling

File Transfer Authorization Cc Attached in Wordperfect format and pasted below is a letter authorizing the transfer of the files for your case from our old firm to our new firm We would appreciate it if you would print the letter or the text below sign and print your name and fax it to me at If you have any questions please do not hesitate to give me a call Thanks Paul D Flack Nickens Lawless Flack LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas fax cell January PERSONAL AND CONFIDENTIAL Clements ONeill Pierce Wilson Fulkerson LLP Attn Mr Craig Zalk Louisiana Suite Houston Texas Re Change of Representation Dear Mr Zalk I have been informed by JC Nickens and Paul Flack that they resigned from Clements ONeill Pierce Nickens Wilson LLP the Firm as of December It is my desire that all legal work for me be transferred to Nickens Lawless Flack LLP This includes all contracts documents exhibits photos recordings and files past and present Nickens Lawless Flack LLP is hereby designated as my duly authorized agent to receive such files and documentation Upon such delivery the Firm will be relieved of any future responsibility for pending legal matters transferred Very truly yours Signature Printed Name File Transfer LetterWPD This email and any attached files may be confidential and subject to attorneyclient privilege If you received it in error please immediately notify the sender by return email or by calling
